been trying for a month to log in, no matter which log in option i choose it says there was an error. called dnb and they said to fix it just restart your phone. still didn't work. i will note that it did work fine when i first got it. i think the latest update has broken it. got it fixed now after ...full review

a good overall app, simple and understandable ui, does what i expect from a mobile bank app. an improvement would be if i could use either my iris recognition or fingerprint while both are enabled. on my note 8, it only allows for iris if it's enabled, this doesn't work that well with sunglasses dur...full review

what a tire fire! so now i can login, after trying the app again after a couple of monthts, but guess what? it cannot show my account! i'm trying to stay polite, but with all that money you can't build a proper app? seriously...
it's slow to log in, like a pregnant sloth! several times it doesn't want to operate. i would expect something more useful, as an app which handles my bank accounts and my money.
new version is worse than the old. why do i need to enter bank id every time i log in? can't this app work with samsung biometrics and can open it with your finger print?
stopped working for the second time this month, massive problems with signing in, i have to use web site to check my personal and bedrift accounts.
what is the point of having this app if we have to enter onetime code for everything??? loading time is awful!!! can not login most of the time - try again try again try again!!!
i cannot get bank id to work while any other app is open on my android phone. this also excludes mobilbank. if i'm using a pc then bank id works ok. very frustrating
i prefer the old version! need to log in every time, must bring the kodebrikke everywhere. what was point?
worst than previous application actually and instead of improving experience has frequent failures. also doesnt work at all in android q
so much better than it was! smooth, clear gui, solid set of basic features. room for development but five stars cos this is a massive step the right direction!

i like the fact that it is easy to access my account.

this version even worse than its previous one. this version is rabish, nothing to compare with sbanken app.
more features than the older app and improved english menus
